title: what REALLY happens on a REVOLVE trip…
itunes:title: what REALLY happens on a REVOLVE trip…
description:
Brooke and Danielle are getting into it this week by recapping their recent trip to the Dominican Republic with REVOLVE!  Are the REVOLVE trips just as cool as the girls on instagram make them look?  What are these influencer trips REALLY like?  The gals also get into some silly travel stories from the week, and share some travel preferences they have determined through the years.  Also, stay tuned for a vocab breakdown of the recent phrases the gals have picked up from one another…. Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories on Instagram!

Please support the show by checking out our sponsors!

Athletic Greens: Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5
FREE travel packs with your first purchase. All you have to do is visit athleticgreens.com/GALS

Apostrophe: To get started, just go to Apostrophe.com/GALS and click Begin Visit, then use our code GALS at sign up and you’ll get your first visit for only $5 dollars! 

BetterHelp: Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/Gals

European Wax Center: Book your smooth escape with the experts at European Wax Center. Make a reservation today—your first wax is free


SHOP GOTG MERCH!  https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go  


GOTG jams playlist https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1vQ4FvPya39ff8SOGK9Dg9?si=87f7bd7fbc4445fd 


GOTG YouTube Channel (watch full episodes with video!)  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkCy3xcN257Hb_VWWU5C5vA
